properties.Name: Store

Columns.Name: StoreId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Store.

Columns.Name: StoreName
Columns.Description: The business name of the store.

Columns.Name: StoreShortName
Columns.Description: The business name of the store.

Columns.Name: LocationId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Location.

Columns.Name: OperatedByPartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: StoreOpenDate
Columns.Description: The date that the store was first opened.

Columns.Name: StoreCloseDate
Columns.Description: The date that the store was permanently closed.

Columns.Name: StoreTelephoneNumber
Columns.Description: The Store telephone number.

Columns.Name: StoreFaxNumber
Columns.Description: The Store fax number.

Columns.Name: StoreEmailAddress
Columns.Description: The Store email address.

Columns.Name: ChannelId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Channel.

Columns.Name: GrossFloorArea
Columns.Description: The total floor area of the Store including display and support areas such as stock keeping, dressing rooms and building functions.

Columns.Name: BuildingFunctionsArea
Columns.Description: The total building functions square footage, which includes air conditioning, heating and dockage.

Columns.Name: NonsellingArea
Columns.Description: The total non-selling square footage of the associated Store.

Columns.Name: AvailableSellingArea
Columns.Description: The total selling area within the Store expressed in square footage.

Columns.Name: NumberOfFloors
Columns.Description: The number of floors of the Store.

Columns.Name: TerritoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Territory.

Columns.Name: AreaId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Territory.

Columns.Name: RegionId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Territory.

Columns.Name: DistrictId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Territory.

Columns.Name: StoreTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Store Type.

Columns.Name: StoreCategoryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Store Category.

Columns.Name: StorePartyId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Party.

Columns.Name: MerchantId
Columns.Description:
The Merchant Identification (MID) is a unique number that identifies your merchant account to payment processing networks and to your payment software.

A series or group of digits that uniquely identifies the merchant to the merchant signing bank for account and billing purposes. 

When a merchant retains the services of a credit card processor, it is issued a merchant ID.

Columns.Name: BrandId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Brand.

Columns.Name: FranchiseeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Franchisee.
